name: Salt bar with seaweed
description:
A bright refreshing scent . The generous size will last a long time! 

Ingredients:  Coconut oil, water, rice bran oil, sodium hydroxide, avocado oil, castor oil, seaweed, lime essential oil, rosemary essential oil, spearmint essential oil.

Weight: 200 - 220g.

Essence soaps are handmade and cut.  Because of this the size, shape and colour may vary slightly from the photograph.  These irregularities are a testament to the virtues of lovely,  pure handmade soap.

name: Oaty floral
description:
Gentle and cleansing.  Oats add the extra benefit of exfoliation

Ingredients: Olive oil, water, coconut oil, sodium hydroxide, beeswax, oats, palma rosa essential oil, lavender essential oil, benzoin essential oil.

A warm floral fragrance with oats added  for a gentle exfoliation.

Each bar weighs between 80g - 85g 

Essence soaps are handmade and cut.  Because of this the size, shape and colour may vary.  These irregularities are a testament to the virtues of lovely,  pure handmade soap.

name: Silky pink clay
description:
A lovely light citrus floral scent combined with pink clay and tussah silk contributes to the overall luxurious and silky texture of this soap.

Ingredients: Extra virgin olive oil, water, coconut oil, rice bran oil, sodium hydroxide, castor oil,pink clay,  tussah silk, orange essential oil, bergamot essential oil, frangipani essential oil,  Roman chamomile essential oil.

Essence soaps are handmade and cut.  Because of this the size, shape and colour may slightly vary from the photograph.  These irregularities are a testament to the virtues of lovely,  pure handmade soap.
